Text: Ok,I`m assuming you have torrent client like UTorrent.First step - Go to the create torrent ( at file ),choose which comic you want to upload,it will ask you where to add your torrent,put it on your desktop or whereever,then upload torrent at piratebay,and then just add torrent from your desktop to utorrent and it will start seeding,just be patient and check if you have put limitations on utorrent.Hope this helps...let me know...and good luck.
